de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.common
Class Operations

java.lang.Object
  de.tud.kom.p2psim.impl.common.Operations

public class Operations
extends java.lang.Object

This class consists exclusively of static methods that either operate on operations, return empty operations or empty operation callbacks.

Version:
3.0, 12/05/2007
Author:
Sebastian Kaune, Konstantin Pussep

Field Detail

EMPTY_CALLBACK

public static final OperationCallback EMPTY_CALLBACK

Constructor Detail

Operations

public Operations()
Method Detail

scheduleEmptyOperation

public static int scheduleEmptyOperation(SupportOperations component,
                                         OperationCallback callback)
Invoking this method schedules immediately an empty operation without any functionality. In addition, the given callback will be informed that the operation has finished with success.

Parameters:
component - the owner (component) of the operation
callback - the given callback
Returns:
the unique operation identifier

createEmptyOperation

public static Operation createEmptyOperation(SupportOperations component,
                                             OperationCallback callback)
Invoking this method creates an empty operation withoun an functionality. The execution of this operation will finish immediately with success.

Parameters:
component - The owner (component) of the operation
callback - the given callback
Returns:
the created empty operation
